Module cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.VariantCaller
Package cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.VariantCaller

Interface VariantsManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultVariantsManager
public interface VariantsManager
Interface for storing and then providing all variants with all stats etc.

  • Method Details

    • reportVariant

      void reportVariant(Variant variant, boolean forwardCovered, boolean forward, boolean reverseCovered, boolean reverse)
      Register the provided variant with the given stats.
      Parameters:
      variant - The found variant
      forwardCovered - Is this variant supported in the forward strand and covered by reverse strand, but NOT supported by the latter?
      forward - Is this variant supported in the forward strand and NOT covered by reverse strand?
      reverseCovered - Is this variant supported in the reverse strand and covered by forward strand, but NOT supported by the latter?
      reverse - Is this variant supported in the reverse strand and NOT covered by forward strand?

    • reportQualityCoverage

      void reportQualityCoverage(String chrom, int pos)
      Add one more quality passing coverage by quality reads at the given location.
      Parameters:
      chrom - The chromosome of the location
      pos - The position in the chromosome (1-based as the Reads are)

    • reportCoverage

      void reportCoverage(String chrom, int pos)
      Add one more coverage by quality reads at the given location.
      Parameters:
      chrom - The chromosome of the location
      pos - The position in the chromosome (1-based as the Reads are)

    • getCoverage

      int getCoverage(String chrom, int pos)
      Get the coverage at the given location.
      Parameters:
      chrom - The chromosome of the location
      pos - The position in the chromosome (1-based as the Reads are)
      Returns:
      The coverage at the location

    • getQualityCoverage

      int getQualityCoverage(String chrom, int pos)
      Get the coverage passing quality at the given location.
      Parameters:
      chrom - The chromosome of the location
      pos - The position in the chromosome (1-based as the Reads are)
      Returns:
      The coverage passing quality at the location

    • output

      Iterable<VariantStats> output()
      Returns:
      All variants
